text.div: • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActCode where concept is-a _ActTherapyDurationWorkingListCode

name: ActTherapyDurationWorkingListCode
title: ActTherapyDurationWorkingListCode
description: Codes used to identify different types of 'duration-based' working lists. Examples include "Continuous/Chronic", "Short-Term" and "As-Needed".
